metadata.description: The name you provide will be appended with a unique sting to make it globally available. The name can contain only letters, numbers and hyphens. The first and last characters must be a letter or number. Spaces are not allowed.
The name you provide will be appended with a unique sting to make it globally available. The field can contain only lowercase letters and numbers. Name must be between 1 and 11 characters.

The name you provide will be appended with a unique sting to make it globally available. Your server name can contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and '-', but can't start or end with '-' or have more than 49 characters.

Your login name must not contain a SQL Identifier or a typical system name (like admin, administrator, sa, root, dbmanager, loginmanager, etc.) or a built-in database user or role (like dbo, guest, public, etc.)

Your password must be at least 8 characters in length. Your password must contain characters from three of the following categories â€“ English uppercase letters, English lowercase letters, numbers (0-9), and non-alphanumeric characters (!, $, #, %, etc.) Your password cannot contain all or part of the login name. Part of a login name is defined as three or more consecutive alphanumeric characters.
Value should not match special patterns. It should contain a length of maximum of 128.
Value should not match special patterns. It should contain a length of maximum of 128.
Specify if you want to write the data into SQL database.
Please specify comma separated email addresses on which you would like to receive the ADF pipeline alerts.

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'filename',
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SourceCSV
SourceCSV derive(each(match(type=='string'), $$ = trim(toString($$))),
		each(match(type=='integer'), $$ = toInteger($$)),
		each(match(type=='short'), $$ = toShort($$)),
		each(match(type=='double'), $$ = round(toDouble($$),3)),
		each(match(type=='decimal'), $$ = toDecimal($$))) ~> CleanData
CleanData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SynapseStagingSink

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> sourceSynapseStagingTable
sourceSynapseStagingTable sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	postSQLs:['\n'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SynapseOperationalTable

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'filename',
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SourceCSV
SourceCSV derive(each(match(type=='string'), $$ = trim(toString($$))),
		each(match(type=='short'), $$ = toShort($$)),
		each(match(type=='integer'), $$ = toInteger($$)),
		each(match(type=='double'), $$ = round(toDouble($$),3)),
		each(match(type=='decimal'), $$ = toDecimal($$))) ~> CleanData
CleanData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SynapseStagingSink
CleanData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLStagingSink

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> sourceSynapseStagingTable
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceSqlDbStaging
sourceSynapseStagingTable sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	t:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	postSQLs:['\n'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SynapseOperationalTable
sourceSqlDbStaging sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SqlOperationalSink

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'filename',
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SourceCSV
SourceCSV derive(each(match(type=='string'), $$ = trim(toString($$))),
		each(match(type=='double'), $$ = round(toDouble($$),3)),
		each(match(type=='short'), $$ = toShort($$)),
		each(match(type=='integer'), $$ = toInteger($$)),
		each(match(type=='decimal'), $$ = toDecimal($$))) ~> CleanData
CleanData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLStagingSink

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceSqlDbStaging
sourceSqlDbStaging sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SqlOperationalSink

source.sqlReaderQuery:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT  * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = N'definitive_HC') 

BEGIN
IF NOT EXISTS (select * from sys.views where name = N'dhc_view')
    EXEC('create view definitive_HC.dhc_view as select State_Name, Num_Staffed_Beds from definitive_HC.operationaldhc;')
select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;

END

ELSE 

BEGIN

select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;

END
